Web Visualization documentation¶

web_visualization.plot_reported_cases(from_date, to_date, time, county='all_counties')¶

Plotting a bar plot (using Altair) of reported covid cases in selected county.

Parameters

  • from_date – date to start plotting from.

  • to_date – date to end plotting data.

  • time – define time frame (daily/weekly)

  • county – define county to plot from.

Returns

a bar plot of selected county, time, and time frame.

web_visualization.plot_cumulative_cases(from_date, to_date, time, county='all_counties')¶

Plotting a line plot (using Altair) of cumulative covid cases in selected county.

Parameters

  • from_date – date to start plotting from.

  • to_date – date to end plotting data.

  • time – define time frame (daily/weekly)

  • county – define county to plot from.

Returns

a line plot of selected county, time, and time frame.

web_visualization.plot_both(county='all_counties')¶

Plotting a line plots (using Altair) of cumulative and reported covid cases in selected county.

This function is executed when url with /plot is called. It also reads from and to dates, so that user can select the period that are beeing plotted.

Parameters

county – the county to plot.

Returns

the html file showing all plots.

web_visualization.help_page()¶

Function to render main documentation html page.

Returns

the html file showing documentation.

web_visualization.plot_norway()¶

Makes a interactive geomap of norway with number of cases per 100k in every county.

Returns

the html file showing interactive geomap.
